Text: Oneok recap OctthAny questions please call Randy Janzen

Meeting to discuss problems with Amarillo Natural Gas Cc Penny and Lynn I would like to set a meeting for us to discuss a problem that has developed with Amarillo Natural Gas deliveries at POI CRI Seaboard and POI Circle Land Cattle Due to the rules that govern the Bushton Universe Amarillo Natural Gas is not able to find gas to purchase at the receipt points that are labeled for these deliveries Randy Janzen

RE Meeting to discuss problems with Amarillo Natural GasYes I will Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Friday October PM To Janzen Randy Cc Garcia Ava Subject RE Meeting to discuss problems with Amarillo Natural Gas Randy do we still need to meet If so work with Ava on a time and date Thanks Lynn Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Thursday October AM To McCarran Penny McDaniel Janet Blair Lynn Kowalke Terry Buchanan John Cc Janzen Randy Subject Meeting to discuss problems with Amarillo Natural Gas Penny and Lynn I would like to set a meeting for us to discuss a problem that has developed with Amarillo Natural Gas deliveries at POI CRI Seaboard and POI Circle Land Cattle Due to the rules that govern the Bushton Universe Amarillo Natural Gas is not able to find gas to purchase at the receipt points that are labeled for these deliveries Randy Janzen

Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problemsWe have tenatively scheduled a meeting with Lynn to discuss the problems we are experiencing with Amarillo Natural Gas The reason it is tenatively is because Lynn has Jury Duty selection on Monday and if picked she will not be heremaybe Date Monday Oct th Time am Place Lynns Office Any questions please let me know Randy

Cara and Evenings Cc Cara worked evenings with me Monday Tuesday Thursday and Saturday She has done well learning the evening routine She has taken lots of notes and seems to understand what needs to be done The area she still has concerns with is El Paso when is it a loop and when is it going to or from TW So be sure to let her know if there are any I let her do everything Saturday evening and with the exception of a couple of questions she soloed I feel she will do fine on evenings starting Wednesday the th Randy

RE GPM Dumas Plant InformationUpdated information Looks like it will be the end of the st quarter of before this happens Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Monday October PM To January Steve Blair Lynn Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Berger Larry Zadow Raetta Cara Vaughan Chris Greaney Debra Scurlock Harry Woodson Janet McDaniel Jean Adama Joe Linhart Kathy Sturr Randy Janzen Robert Benningfield Scott Hibbard Email Sherry Forbish DLETS Gas Controllers Subject GPM Dumas Plant Information I talked to Lavila Lawrence with Duke Energy Field Services LP and she advised me that the GPM Dumas Plant POI is going to be shutdown effective January They will diverting some of the gas to other pipelines and any gas that will be coming to NNG will come through interconnects that David Moon takes care of in the Texas Panhandle Any questions please call Randy Janzen

RE Marketing Dashboard Access Cc I have created guidelines on how to do this If you need to use them please feel free to come by my office or if you need some help I would be glad to help anyone who needs some Randy J Original Message From Buchanan John Sent Thursday November AM To Berger Larry Bodnar Michael Kowalke Terry Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary Zadow Raetta Adams Jean Barry Patrick Benningfield Robert Blair Jean Bryan Randy Callans Nancy Carr James Clapper Karen Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Hibbard Scott Janzen Randy Linhart Joe McDaniel Janet Perry Renee Porter Diana Scurlock Debra Sturr Kathy Vaughan Cara Walden Shirley Washington Kathy Wilkens Jerry Woodson Harry Cc Blair Lynn Subject FW Marketing Dashboard Access Lynn wants all the Customer Service Reps to have access to the Dashboard I cant send a single request for the teams so please follow the below instructions to request access to the Dashboard Original Message From McCary Sandy Sent Wednesday November PM To Buchanan John Janousek Martha Cc Blair Lynn Kowalke Terry Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Please use eRequest datahome to obtain access to the ETS Marketing Dashboard Once logged in do the following Click on Update Account Access Choose Applications Region ETS Application ETS Dashboard Each individual desiring access to the Dashboard should submit an eRequest If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks Sandy McCary Enron Transportation Services IT Original Message From Buchanan John Sent Wed PM To Janousek Martha McCary Sandy Cc Blair Lynn Kowalke Terry Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Sandy there around persons that Lynn wants access to the Dashboard please let me know what I can do to facilitate the process Thanks John Buchanan Original Message From Janousek Martha Sent Wednesday November PM To Buchanan John McCary Sandy Cc Barker Courtney Mason Robert Blair Lynn Kowalke Terry Ferguson Mark Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access John Sandy McCary is the IT Head Honcho of the Dashboard and she can take good care of you smile Sandy Please assist John Buchanan in setting up the list of Market Services people with access to the Dashboard Thanks so much Martha Original Message From Buchanan John Sent Wednesday November AM To Blair Lynn Janousek Martha Kowalke Terry Cc Barker Courtney Mason Robert Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Martha I am back in the office so can you please let me know what you need to set the below mentioned person up for the Dashboard I also had access at one time and can no longer access the Dashboard John Buchanan Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Tuesday November AM To Janousek Martha Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Cc Barker Courtney Mason Robert Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Martha I would rather give the teams access to the Dashboard John Buchanan will be back in the office Wednesday You can coordinate with him and Terry Kowalke to get everyone set up Thanks Lynn Original Message From Janousek Martha Sent Monday November PM To Blair Lynn Cc Barker Courtney Mason Robert Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Lynn Below is a list of people that Courtney Barkerin Marketing sends a couple of reports on daily index prices to every month Courtney is now posting these reports on the Marketing Dashboard Would you like to give your employees below access to the Dashboard or does Courtney need to continue sending the reports via EMail Please advise us and we will be glad to follow through Thanks so much Martha Original Message From Barker Courtney Sent Monday November AM To Janousek Martha Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Yes I am referring to the people in Market Services here is a list of who I am sending it to Jean Adams Robert Benningfield Sherry Forbish Chris Greaney Scott Hibbard Randy Janzen Terry Kowalke Joe Linhart Janet McDaniel Debra Scurlock Kathy Sturr Harry Woodson They all appear to be some form of Market Service Reps Just let me know Thanks Courtney Original Message From Janousek Martha Sent Monday November AM To Barker Courtney Cc Brennan Lorna McCary Sandy Mason Robert Subject RE Marketing Dashboard Access Courtney Clarification on They have indicated to me that they do not have access to the dashboard Do we need to get them access to the dashboard or should I continue emailing them the report at the end of each month Are you referring to people in Market Services and if so what level are they Martha Original Message From Barker Courtney Sent Monday November AM To Janousek Martha Cc Brennan Lorna McCary Sandy Mason Robert Subject Marketing Dashboard Access Martha As you know Sandy McCary assisted me in getting my daily spot file report and MIP reports posted to the Marketing Dashboard At the end of the month I send the MIP files to about people in Marketing Services I am no longer emailing the report to people in Marketing since most are using the dashboard They have indicated to me that they do not have access to the dashboard Do we need to get them access to the dashboard or should I continue emailing them the report at the end of each month Thanks Courtney Barker

RE PEP Suggested ReviewersThats fine I talked to Chris after I sent my names to you and she said she had several people who had chosen her for a reviewer Thanks Randy Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Tuesday November PM To Janzen Randy Subject PEP Suggested Reviewers Randy I had to change Chris to Robert for one of your reviews Please let me know if you have any concerns Thanks Lynn
RE Oneok recap OctstAny questions please call me Randy

GPM Dumas Plant InformationI talked to Lavila Lawrence with Duke Energy Field Services LP and she advised me that the GPM Dumas Plant POI is going to be shutdown effective January They will diverting some of the gas to other pipelines and any gas that will be coming to NNG will come through interconnects that David Moon takes care of in the Texas Panhandle She said They wouldnt have to derhime that plant anymore which gave me the impression that the cost of maintenance might be the reason for the shutdown Any questions please call Randy Janzen

Dr Appointments Eye and Diabetes Cc Due to the complications I am having with my right eye following the Lasik Enhancement I am going to be going to the eye doctor more frequently than planned I have another appointment at the eye doctor tomorrow Thursday the th pm Since this will basically consume most of the afternoon I went ahead and made a followup appointment with my primary care doctor He has increased my diabetes Rx and needs to evaluate its effectiveness Randy

Robert Benningfields MotherRoberts mother fell and broke one of her wrists this afternoon They are doing surgery this evening and he is on his way there Robert will call back tomorrow to let us know more about her condition Chris is covering his desk on Tuesday and Scott the rest of the week If you need to contact Robert his phone s are Cell Mothers

Update on Roberts MotherRobert called in The surgery went well and his mother is doing fine She will be going home in the morning Wednesday The fall shattered the bones in her right wrist and the doctors put a plate in it Robert is going to stay at his moms until Friday Roberts mothers information LaBerta Benningfield Rowland Stephenville Texas Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Monday November PM To Garcia Ava Eldridge Dale Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary January Steve Buchanan John Berger Larry Blair Lynn Bodnar Michael Kowalke Terry Zadow Raetta Corman Shelley Barry Patrick Callans Nancy Clapper Karen James Carr Email Jean Blair Email Jerry Wilkens Email Kathy Washington Email Perry Renee Porter Diana Randy Bryan Email Shirley Walden Email Cara Vaughan Chris Greaney Debra Scurlock Harry Woodson Janet McDaniel Jean Adama Joe Linhart Kathy Sturr Randy Janzen Robert Benningfield Scott Hibbard Sherry Forbish Subject Robert Benningfields Mother Roberts mother fell and broke one of her wrists this afternoon They are doing surgery this evening and he is on his way there Robert will call back tomorrow to let us know more about her condition Chris is covering his desk on Tuesday and Scott the rest of the week If you need to contact Robert his phone s are Cell Mothers

RE Duke Field Services Contract Cc I have finished this spreadsheet and handed it off to Vernon who will contact Duke to see what they think Randy Original Message From Barker Courtney Sent Friday October AM To Janzen Randy Cc Blair Lynn Mercaldo Vernon Brennan Lorna Williams Jo Subject Duke Field Services Contract In our effort to decide if we need to renegotiate contract and with Duke to possibly eliminate the BTU Daily Gas Wire numbers and instead use the Gas Daily numbers I have attached a spreadsheet that gives the Gas Daily and BTU Daily Gas Wire numbers for Mid and Demarc Randy could you please run the Gas Daily numbers in your calculation for the last months We would like to see the bottom line impact between using the BTU Daily Gas Wire publication vs the Gas Daily publication We are hoping this will give some insight on whether it would be beneficial to us to renegotiate the contracts Thanks Courtney Barker File MidDemarcxls

RE Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problems Cc Ava told me you were on Jury Duty on Monday I meant Tuesday Oct th if you are that day Sorry for the mistake Randy Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Friday October PM To Janzen Randy Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Benningfield Robert McDaniel Janet McCarran Penny Cc Garcia Ava Subject RE Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problems I am on jury duty Oct th Please be sure you are working with Ava to check my calendar before scheduling a meeting Thanks Lynn Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Friday October PM To Blair Lynn Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Benningfield Robert Janzen Randy McDaniel Janet McCarran Penny Subject Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problems We have tenatively scheduled a meeting with Lynn to discuss the problems we are experiencing with Amarillo Natural Gas The reason it is tenatively is because Lynn has Jury Duty selection on Monday and if picked she will not be heremaybe Date Monday Oct th Time am Place Lynns Office Any questions please let me know Randy

RE Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problems REVISIONCORRECTION Date Tuesday Oct th Same place and time Randy Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Friday October PM To Blair Lynn Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Benningfield Robert Janzen Randy McDaniel Janet McCarran Penny Subject Tentative Meeting Amarillo Natural Gas problems We have tenatively scheduled a meeting with Lynn to discuss the problems we are experiencing with Amarillo Natural Gas The reason it is tenatively is because Lynn has Jury Duty selection on Monday and if picked she will not be heremaybe Date Monday Oct th Time am Place Lynns Office Any questions please let me know Randy
RE Oneok recap OctthAny questions please call Randy Janzen

Bushton Balance through UPDATE Please disregard previous Bushton Report for thI talked to Steve in NNG Gas Control to see why we had such a difference in the PVR Shrink for the th He is showing the volume for the PVR measured which would be only a difference and make the monthly only difference I also went out into PGAS and confirmed the volume measured was indeed dth Apparently we have an issue between PGAS and the TMS system I will get with Harry the PGAS group and the TMS in the morning to see if we can figure out what is going on So please disregard the Bushton Report for the th Randy Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Sunday October AM To Woodson Harry Forbish Sherry Linhart Joe McDaniel Janet Sturr Kathy Hibbard Scott Benningfield Robert Greaney Chris Adams Jean Blair Lynn Darveaux Mary Floyd Jodie Kile Rick Mendez Angela Stage Michael G Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary January Steve Corman Shelley Cessac Kenneth Berger Larry McCarran Penny Herber Stephen Vaughan Cara Janzen Randy Subject Bushton Balance through Attached is the Bushton Balance through October If you have any questions please call me at Please note the change in volumes on the th Randy Janzen File NNG Bushton PVR pdf

Actual Volumes in TMS for October thThere is a problem between PGAS and TMS The actual volumes for the th are not correct in TMS In doing the Bushton PVR report I found that the actual volume in TMS did not match the actual volume in PGAS for the PVR measured I then began to look at other points Spearman Beaver Cos etc and found the same problem existed Randy Janzen

Oneok recap Octth is UnavailableRecap for the th is not available There are incorrect actuals in the TMS system that will need to be corrected before we can get accurate information for this report Randy Janzen

RE Actual Volumes in TMS for October thIn talking to Terry Kolwalke and Jodie Floyd apparently there is a timing issue between the two systems and this caused the problem There were some other measurement issues related to Bushton and they reran the numbers and cleared up these problems Randy Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Sunday October AM To Kowalke Terry Nacey Sheila Zadow Raetta Blair Lynn Berger Larry Buchanan John Hottap HelpDesk Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary TMS OnCall Sommer Carol Holmes Bradley Callans Nancy Clapper Karen James Carr Email Jean Blair Email Jerry Wilkens Email Kathy Washington Email Pat Berry Perry Renee Porter Diana Randy Bryan Email Shirley Walden Email Cara Vaughan Chris Greaney Debra Scurlock Harry Woodson Janet McDaniel Jean Adama Joe Linhart Kathy Sturr Randy Janzen Robert Benningfield Scott Hibbard Email Sherry Forbish Subject Actual Volumes in TMS for October th There is a problem between PGAS and TMS The actual volumes for the th are not correct in TMS In doing the Bushton PVR report I found that the actual volume in TMS did not match the actual volume in PGAS for the PVR measured I then began to look at other points Spearman Beaver Cos etc and found the same problem existed Randy Janzen

Estimated volumes for the October thTerry Kolwalke asked me to send an email to the Hottap HelpDesk concerning the missing estimated volumes for the th Hottap HelpDesk Will you contact the proper persons concerning the missing estimated volumes in TMS for the th Randy Janzen

PEPL MULLINVILLE POI Effective today October th Cara Vaughan is assuming the responsibities for this point on a permanent basis If you have any questions please call Cara I will be her backup for this point Dennis and Raetta will you make the necessary name change in our systems to reflect this change Thanks Randy J
Beaver Co IC POI Duke Energy Field Services has requested this Interconnect be opened up at a rate of dth beginning am on Tuesday Oct th Any questions please call me Randy Janzen

Oneok recap Octth is UnavailableRecap for the th is not available There are incorrect actuals in the TMS system that will need to be corrected before we can get accurate information for this report Randy Janzen

Actual Volumes in TMS for October thThere is a problem between PGAS and TMS The actual volumes for the th are not correct in TMS In doing the Bushton PVR report I found that the actual volume in TMS did not match the actual volume in PGAS for the PVR measured I then began to look at other points Spearman Beaver Cos etc and found the same problem existed Randy Janzen

Bushton Balance through UPDATE Please disregard previous Bushton Report for thI talked to Steve in NNG Gas Control to see why we had such a difference in the PVR Shrink for the th He is showing the volume for the PVR measured which would be only a difference and make the monthly only difference I also went out into PGAS and confirmed the volume measured was indeed dth Apparently we have an issue between PGAS and the TMS system I will get with Harry the PGAS group and the TMS in the morning to see if we can figure out what is going on So please disregard the Bushton Report for the th Randy Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Sunday October AM To Woodson Harry Forbish Sherry Linhart Joe McDaniel Janet Sturr Kathy Hibbard Scott Benningfield Robert Greaney Chris Adams Jean Blair Lynn Darveaux Mary Floyd Jodie Kile Rick Mendez Angela Stage Michael G Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary January Steve Corman Shelley Cessac Kenneth Berger Larry McCarran Penny Herber Stephen Vaughan Cara Janzen Randy Subject Bushton Balance through Attached is the Bushton Balance through October If you have any questions please call me at Please note the change in volumes on the th Randy Janzen File NNG Bushton PVR pdf

Amarillo Natural Gas POI Circle Land Cattle Cc This point is only flowing around dthday with a nomination of dthday which is autoconfirmed I have confirmed this point to zero for rest of the month in order to balance I will monitor and make any necessary changes if the delivery volumes increase Randy Janzen

GPMDuke Dumas Plant UpdateI talked to Lavila Lawrence and Duke has postponed the permanent shut down of this plant The last date she gave me was April st but this has been extended to an undetermined date for now Soon as I heard anything different I will let everyone know Randy

FW Lamar Nominations Mar Original Message From ENRON On Behalf Of Sent Friday March AM To Spraggins Gary Linhart Joe Janzen Randy Cc Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Subject Lamar Nominations Mar weekend again Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for March At this time we plan on Thanks Jamie Schnorf FPL See attached file Lamar NNG Nominationxls Lamar NNG Nominationxls

GPMDuke Dumas Plant POI DerhimeThe Dumas plant is going to Derhime starting at am tomorrow Friday March nd They will continue to flow approximately dth of raw gas They DO NOT have a processing agreement with OneOk at Bushton but the gas will physically be diverted into the BLine due to it being raw The plan is for them to be down through Tuesday morning at am subject to changes that may extend the time Any questions please call Randy Janzen
RE Oneok recap OctstAny questions please call me Randy

Update on Roberts DaughterRobert just called in and had some more details He talked to Gay again Sunny is OK walked away from the wreck It totaled her car The airbag did not inflate so she was very lucky not to be hurt He will report more when he gets there Randy J

Dumas Plant POI The Dumas Plant will be finished with the maintenance of their plant on schedule They will be ready for their gas to be switched back to the Cline effective am in the morning Tuesday th Any questions please call Randy Janzen

FW Revised Lamar Nominations Mar Original Message From ENRON On Behalf Of Sent Monday March PM To Spraggins Gary Linhart Joe Janzen Randy Cc Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Subject Revised Lamar Nominations Mar Attached is the NNG Lamar burn schedule for March At this time we plan on Thanks Jamie Schnorf FPL See attached file Lamar NNG Nominationxls Lamar NNG Nominationxls

OBA Payback for Feb There is an OBA Payback nomination at two points POI Linam Ranch and POI Reeves The payback is for dthday at both points One is a receipt to NNG Reeves and the other is a delivery to Duke Linam Ranch Since NNG controls Reeves there should not be any problems there but at Linam Ranch Duke operates the point Please give me or someone on the South Central team a call if Linam Ranch is running over their order so we can call the scheduler and have them make corrections to their volumes Your help is greatly appreciated Randy Janzen New scheduler for Duke is Wayne Hawkins

Randys Desk for Wed and Thursday Cc email email email email email email email email Sherry is going to cover my desk for me while I am out on Comp I will return on Friday and work the Evening for Janet Randy

OBA Payback for OneOk Westex Cc Gary Spraggins and Kay Threet have agreed to an OBA Payback of dth at POI Tex Harvey Delivery to them and POI Reeves Receipt back to NNG This is creates a zero net effect on the pipe The Payback at Reeves will increase from to dth with this payback The first dth reflects a similiar payback agreement where the payback is at POI Duke Linam Ranch Delivery to Duke This will have OneOk Westexs OBAs near zero by the end of the month If you have any questions please call me Randy Janzen

POI OneOk Westex ReevesI have been working closely with OneOk Westex this month in order to balance their OBA at Reeves and to date we are still approximately dth over delivered to them Gary Spraggins approved and OneOk agreed to NNG set the flow control to them at dth less that their scheduled to make this up for rest of the month Roy Armitage in NNG Gas Control was contacted and has made the adjustments Any questions please call Randy Janzen

RE A BIG THANKSYes I am feeling a whole lot better I still have one kidney stone in my right kidney that will be something special to look forward to This time with the knowledge I acquired from this first experience my Urologist and I have a PLAN of ACTION prepared This should make the second episode less painful Or least it sounds good Randy Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday February AM To Janzen Randy Subject Re A BIG THANKS What a nice note I hope you are feeling better Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

A BIG THANKS Cc Just wanted to say THANKS to everybody for helping me when I went down with my kidney stone and afterwards while I was gone Janet for calling for HELP calling my wife and working Wednesday evening Robert for going to the hospital with me Scott for working Tuesday evening Harry for working the rest of the week Kathy for doing my suspense gas Sherry and Joe for doing the Lamar GVA entries And everybody for doing whatever you did that I dont know about I appreciate the team effort and wanted everyone to know how grateful I am to work with such great people Randy
